field.label: Config file path
field.help: Path to the KixDNS JSON configuration file (generated from Pipeline Editor).

field.label: Bind UDP
field.help: Address and port for UDP listener (e.g. 0.0.0.0:5353).

field.label: Bind TCP
field.help: Address and port for TCP listener (e.g. 0.0.0.0:5353).

field.label: Upstream Timeout (ms)
field.help: Timeout in milliseconds for upstream queries.

field.label: Response Jump Limit
field.help: Maximum number of pipeline jumps during response processing.

field.label: Min TTL
field.help: Minimum TTL in seconds for cached responses.

field.label: UDP Workers
field.help: Number of UDP worker threads (0 = auto, uses CPU core count).

field.label: Listener Label
field.help: Listener instance label for pipeline selection (matches --listener-label CLI option).

field.label: Debug Logging
field.help: Enable debug logging for the KixDNS process.
